summary: A drama that chronicles the civil war that raged after the 1917 Bolshevik revolution.
cast: Leonid Bichevin|Ingeborga Dapkunaite|Andrey Panin|Svetlana Pismichenko|Katarina Radivojevic|Yuri Gertsman|Aleksandr Mosin|Irina Rakshina|Sergey Garmash|Yuliya Deynega|Andrey Poluyan|Irina Volkova|Valeriy Smirnov|Petr Rabchevsky|Oleg Korytin|Valeriy Zaytsev|Natalya Kondrateva|Evgeniya Dolgova|Agniya Kuznetsova|Irina Girsch|Valeri Vasilyev|Daria Tsiberkina|Aleksandr Malyavin|Nadezhda Zharikova|Elena Andreeva|Vasilisa Miridonova|Svetlana Tuchina|Vladimir Sapunkov|Valeri Sinelnikov|Aleksey Istomin|Daniil Shigapov|Ilya Ukhanov|Victor Vinter|Nina Antonova|Lyudmila Gorelova|Lidiya Dorotenko|Aleksander Smirnov|Sergei Bodrov|Tatyana Chizhova|Aleksey Poluyan
title: Morfiy
